name: Bubs & Flubs
description:
Bubs & Flubs
Bubs is doing his annual run to the surface with help from his friend Spud. How long has Bubs been trying to reach the surface? Why is he doing this? Why does he have legs? These and other questions will probably not be answered. 

Controls
Directional Keys - Move
Z - Jump / Interact
X - Shoot bubbles
R - Restart the room
